soql_query.title: SOQL Query
soql_query.description: Specify the SOQL query, eg. SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName FROM Contact

is_deleted.title: Get deleted records
is_deleted.description: Fetch records that have been deleted

incremental_field.title: Incremental Field
incremental_field.description: Salesforce object field to use for incremental fetching, eg. LastModifiedDate for most Salesforce objects or CreatedDate for Salesforce History objects

incremental_fetch.title: Incremental fetching
incremental_fetch.description: Fetch records that have been updated since the last run of the component with a specified field

incremental.title: Load type
incremental.description: If set to Incremental update, the result tables will be updated based on primary key and new records will be fetched. Full load overwrites the destination table each time.
